task.title: Moving security patches data for the "FROM" release

context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to move security patches data from all the VMs. This data is present in /appdata/savedrpms. These rpms are security patches for the FROM release and they must be moved before the upgrade. All steps in this procedure must be performed as the “root” user.

step.cmd: Log in to the NCC as the "root" user on OAME node.
Move the security patches data, if present, from the /appdata/savedrpms to /appdata/tmp using the following command.
